Permanent Setup Help

Task Part #1: Web App

Database: Sqlite or MongoDB

Web Framework: Flask

Login Page:

A page where users can access the app and dashboard.

A feature to create an account.

Dashboard:

A view which shows products from the attached orders csv in a table.

The table should contain only the following columns:

  • Order ID
  • Product Name
  • Order Status
  • Product URL (should be a hyperlink)
  • Cost Price (attached CSV has the cost price in Dollars. The view should contain the cost price in indian rupees. 1 USD = 66 INR.)

    • We should be able to sort orders using the Order Status.


    Part II: Scrapy integration Task

    Create a page with a simple button with which a Scrapy spider can be deployed. The details of the working of the spider are as follows:

    Framework for Crawlers: Python/Scrapy

    Website to scrape: www.liveyoursport.com

    What to Scrape: Scrape all products(including all paginations) under the category Squash on LiveYourSport.com. For every product, extract the Product Name, Price, Description(without HTML Tags) and URL and store it in a CSV file. Each row of the output CSV file should correspond to different products. Please refer to the attached Sample Scrape csv for the desired output format.

    File Handling: Once the scrape is finished, the output csv file should be available to download from a file management page on the app.
